name: AFRLoanCenter
0:
”Alexa, ask AFR Loan Center what does my pipeline look like”
”Alexa, ask AFR Loan Center how do I contact the lock desk”
”Alexa, ask AFR Loan Center what loans have been cleared to close recently”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a. f. r. loan center
Developer Terms of Use
des: Provides AFR Wholesale approved brokers access to account information. Approved brokers can link this Alexa skill using their AFR Loan Center account and ask for information about their current pipeline.
